entry.content: Image. Nintendo EPD/Nintendo via Polygon Try at your own peril Video games are meant to be broken ‚Äî at least, according to a certain subset of gamers believe. And with a game as big as The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom, there‚Äôs a lot to break. Typically, players exploit glitches to assist in speed runs or adjust something in game ‚Äî say, add the ability to duplicate important items.
